# cloudtemple_object_storage_global_access_key (Resource)

Manage the global access key for object storage. This is a singleton resource that renews the access key credentials.

To manage this resource you will need the `object-storage_iam_management` role.

## Example Usage

```terraform
resource "cloudtemple_object_storage_global_access_key" "example" {
  # This resource manages the global access key for object storage
  # Creating this resource will renew the global access key credentials
}

output "access_key_id" {
  value = cloudtemple_object_storage_global_access_key.example.access_key_id
}

output "access_secret_key" {
  value     = cloudtemple_object_storage_global_access_key.example.access_secret_key
  sensitive = true
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Read-Only

- `access_key_id` (String) The access key ID.
- `access_secret_key` (String, Sensitive) The secret access key. This is only available after renewal (creation).
- `id` (String) The ID of this resource.
